&ShTvityA#haq mana# EqvASnu#ta uqrva#ntari#kShaq-manviqhItyA#hA-ntarikShadEvaqtyO# hi prAqNaH svAhA$ tvA suBavaqH sUryAqyEtyA#ha prAqNA vai svaBa#vasO dEqvAstEShvEqva paqrOkSha#M juhOti dEqvEBya#stvA marIciqpEByaq ityA#hA 
&&*diqtyasyaq vai raqSmayO# dEqvA ma#rIciqpAstEShAqM tad BA#gaqdhEyaqM tAnEqva tEna# prINAtiq yadi# kAqmayE#taq var.Shu#kaH paqrjanya#H- [  ] 24
